content: **c2c crochet lemon peel stitch dishcloth pattern and tutorial with video** **buy any 2 patterns for 30% off** explore the world of corner to corner c2c crochet with this lemon peel stitch dishcloth pattern and tutorial perfect for beginners this pattern guides you through the creation of a beautiful and functional dishcloth using the unique lemon peel stitch ideal for adding a handmade touch to your kitchen or for crafting thoughtful gifts this project is both enjoyable and rewarding **pattern details ** * craft crochet * category dishcloths * skill level advanced beginner * yarn weight worsted dk or fingering * hook size 5 0 mm h * yardage approximately 90-130 yards depending on yarn weight used * sizes available one size but easily adaptable * pdf version includes print at home belly bands **features ** * c2c corner to corner crochet technique * lemon peel stitch pattern * step-by-step written instructions * comprehensive video tutorial included **materials needed ** * worsted dk or 4ply weight yarn in your choice of colour * 5 0 4 0 or 3 0mm crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle for weaving in ends * gauge gauge is not critical for this project **notes** this pattern is perfect for beginners looking to expand their skills with the c2c technique and the lemon peel stitch the included video tutorial provides a visual guide to complement the written instructions ensuring a successful and enjoyable crochet experience share your work join our ravelry group lullaby lodge designs 1 to share your progress get tips and connect with fellow crocheters or join in with pattern testing we can t wait to see your beautiful creations 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/lullaby-lodge-designs---ravelry-community-group
